article.title: Leidos to Support Biological Engagement Program
article.text:
Leidos Inc., Reston, Virginia, is awarded a contract (HDTRA1-17-C-0019) with a ceiling value of $35,921,608 ceiling time, materials contract, and does not include the value of the unexercised options. This contract is for scientific and technical services in support of various projects under the Cooperative Biological Engagement program. Work will be performed at various locations throughout the world. The anticipated completion date is January 30, 2018 (base period); this contract includes four 12-month options that would end on January 30, 2022, if all options are exercised. The contract was a competitive acquisition; the government received 11 offers. The Defense Threat Reduction Agency, CTR Contracting Office/DTRA/J4COC, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
